title: Riot Fix Nidalee spear already
body: Situations like in this video keeps happening when I play nidalee. Spear look like they quite clearly connected but deal no damage, I assume it something to do with the hit box but is there anyway Riot can fix this ?

replies.body:
Hey WizSanji7,

The Help & Support sub-board is more geared towards technical issues and sometimes general questions. For bug reports, I strongly urge you to post your feedback in the Report a Bug sub-board on the North American Boards:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Thanks!
